content: with a seamless construction scrumptious texture and two options for sleeves bell or straight sigfrid sweater is designed to be your go-to comfy pullover this crochet design is experienced-beginner friendly *this pattern is available for free on the make and do crew blog find an inexpensive ad-free pdf version here https //www etsy com/listing/856411506/pattern-sigfrid-sweater-crochet-raglan ref=shop_home_active_1 sizing includes instructions for 6 sizes small medium large xl 2xl and 3xl 32-54 bust range you will need worsted weight category 4 yarn for this sweater specific yarn and substitutes are provided in the pattern digital pattern includes -list of materials needed to complete project -gauge -approximate finished measurement/sizing chart -terminology guide - this pattern uses standard us crochet terminology -written pattern -photograph tutorials -links to video tutorials -finishing instructions please let me know if you have any additional questions i am always happy to help notes on sale and distribution *feel free to sell what you make from this pattern giving credit lady jay crochet for the design *please do credit @ladyjaycrochet for the design when posting to social media use hashtag #ladyjaycrochet so i can see your finished masterpiece  *please do not alter this pattern in any way and claim as your own design *please do not distribute this pattern for free or alter in any way and sell it as your own pattern i spent much time perfecting and writing it out for your enjoyment thank you
